required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase 2 Study Of VLA15, A Vaccine Candidate Against Lyme Borreliosis, In A Healthy Peadiatric And Adult Study Population
clinical_study.official_title: Safety And Immunogenicity Study Of VLA15, A Multivalent Recombinant OspA Based Vaccine Candidate Against Lyme Borreliosis: A Randomized, Controlled, Observer-Blind Phase 2 Study In A Healthy Pediatric And Adult Study Population

brief_summary.textblock: VLA15-221 is a Phase 2 study, which will be conducted in two parts: Main Study Phase (Part A) and Booster Phase (Part B). The study will compare the safety and immunogenicity of two different primary immunization schedules applying three (Month 0-2-6) or two (Month 0-6) vaccinations. Within the study, 600 healthy subjects aged 5-65 years will be included. Subjects with a history of Lyme borreliosis (previous infection with Borrelia) as well as Borrelia na√Øve subjects will be enrolled. Study duration per subject will be a maximum of 19 months in Part A and additional 37 months for subjects enrolled in the Part B.

detailed_description.textblock: VLA15-221 is a randomized, observer-blind, placebo controlled, multicenter Phase 2 study, which is set up in two parts: Main Study Phase (Part A) and Booster Phase (Part B). In Part A 600 subjects aged 5-65 years will be enrolled 1:1:1 into three groups: Group 1 will be vaccinated with VLA15 at Month 0-2-6, Group 2 will be vaccinated with VLA15 at Month 0-6 and with placebo at Month 2 and Group 3 will be vaccinated with placebo at Month 0-2-6. In Part B a subset of subjects will receive a booster injection with VLA15 or placebo at Month 18.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Frequency of solicited local and solicited systemic AEs (Adverse Events)
primary_outcome.description: Frequency of solicited local and solicited systemic AEs (Adverse Events) within 7 days after each and any vaccination of the primary vaccination series (Part A)

primary_outcome.measure: GMTs (Geometric Mean Titers) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype
primary_outcome.description: GMTs (Geometric Mean Titers) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype ST1 to ST6, determined by an IgG (Immunoglobulin G) binding assay at Day 208/Month 7 (Part A).

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of solicited local and solicited systemic AEs (Adverse Events)
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of solicited local and solicited systemic AEs (Adverse Events) within 7 days after booster dose administration (Part B)
Frequency of SAEs (Serious Adverse Events) during the entire study

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of AESIs (Adverse Events of Special Interest)
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of AESIs (Adverse Events of Special Interest) during the entire study.

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of unsolicited AEs (Adverse Events) after each vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of unsolicited AEs (Adverse Events) within 28 days after each vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of SAEs (Serious Adverse Events), AESIs(Adverse Events of Special Interest), unsolicited and solicited AEs stratified by age cohort
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of SAEs (Serious Adverse Events), AESIs (Adverse Events of Special Interest), unsolicited and solicited AEs (Adverse Events) stratified by age cohort

secondary_outcome.measure: GMTs (Geometric Mean Titers) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype (Part A)
secondary_outcome.description: GMTs (Geometric Mean Titers) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype (ST1 to ST6), determined by an IgG (Immunoglobulin G) binding assay, at baseline (screening visit) and at Day 85, 180, 194, 365 and Month 18 (Part A)

secondary_outcome.measure: SCRs (Seroconversion Rates) for each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype specific IgG (Immunoglobulin G) (Part A)
secondary_outcome.description: SCRs (Seroconversion Rates) for each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype specific IgG (Immunoglobulin G) (ST1 to ST6), determined by an IgG (Immunoglobulin G) binding assay, at Day 85, 180, 194, 208, 365 and Month 18 (Part A)

secondary_outcome.measure: GMFRs (Geometric Mean of the Fold Rises) for IgG against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype (Part A)
secondary_outcome.description: GMFRs (Geometric Mean of the Fold Rises) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype (ST1 to ST6), determined by an IgG (Immunoglobulin G) binding assay, at Day 85 and 208 (Part A)

secondary_outcome.measure: GMTs (Geometric Mean Titers) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype stratified by age cohort (Part A)
secondary_outcome.description: GMTs (Geometric Mean Titers) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype (ST1 to ST6), determined by an IgG (Immunoglobulin G) binging assay, at specified time-points, stratified by age cohort. (Part A)

secondary_outcome.measure: SCRs (Seroconversion Rates) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype stratified by age cohort (Part A)
secondary_outcome.description: SCRs (Seroconversion Rates) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype (ST1 to ST6), determined by an IgG (Immunoglobulin G) binging assay, at specified time-points, stratified by age cohort. (Part A)

secondary_outcome.measure: GMFRs (Geometric Mean Fold Rises) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype stratified by age cohort (Part A)
secondary_outcome.description: GMFRs (Geometric Mean Fold Rises) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype (ST1 to ST6), determined by an IgG (Immunoglobulin G) binging assay, at specified time-points, stratified by age cohort. (Part A)

secondary_outcome.measure: GMTs (Geometric Mean Titers) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype (Part B)
secondary_outcome.description: GMTs (Geometric Mean Titers) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype (ST1 to ST6), determined by an IgG (Immunoglobulin G) binding assay, at Month 18, 19, 23, 26, 30, 36, 42, 48 and 54 (Part B)

secondary_outcome.measure: SCRs (Seroconversion Rates) for each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype specific IgG (Immunoglobulin G) (Part B)
secondary_outcome.description: SCRs (Seroconversion Rates) for each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype specific IgG (ST1 to ST6), determined by an IgG (Immunoglobulin G) binding assay, at Month 18, 19, 23, 26, 30, 36, 42, 48 and 54 (Part B)

secondary_outcome.measure: GMFRs (Geometric Mean of the Fold Rises) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype (Part B)
secondary_outcome.description: GMFRs (Geometric Mean of the Fold Rises) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype (ST1 to ST6), determined by an IgG (Immunoglobulin G) binding assay, at Month 19 (Part B)

secondary_outcome.measure: GMTs (Geometric Mean Titers) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype stratified by age cohort (Part B)

secondary_outcome.description: SCRs (Seroconversion Rates) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype (ST1 to ST6), determined by an IgG (Immunoglobulin G) binding assay, at specified time-points, stratified by age cohort. (Part B)

secondary_outcome.measure: GMFRs (Geometric Mean Fold Rises) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype stratified by age cohort (Part B)
secondary_outcome.description: GMFRs (Geometric Mean Fold Rises) for IgG (Immunoglobulin G) against each OspA (Outer Surface Protein A) serotype (ST1 to ST6), determined by an IgG (Immunoglobulin G) binding assay, at specified time-points, stratified by age cohort. (Part B)

arm_group.description: Part A: VLA15 at Month 0, 2 and 6 - Part B: VLA15 or placebo depending on schedule selection
Part A: VLA15 at Month 0 and 6, placebo at Month 2 - Part B: VLA15 or placebo depending on schedule selection

intervention.description: a multivalent recombinant Outer Surface Protein A (OspA) based vaccine candidate
